name: CARSTEROIDS
description: A challenging top-down shooter set in a dark future where humanity has colonised the asteroids. The place is now a set for a vehicular combat game show.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent dual core @2.40 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: WebGL compatible @500 MHz - 1Mb Memory @800 MHz DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: any
